content.text:
Hey you. Are you using Arch Linux? Do you use the AUR? I did a thing (or two):

https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/ssb-patchwork-git/
https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/patchbay-git/

I loved using the bleeding-edge versions of Patchwork and Patchbay, but the whole `cd /over/the/rainbow && npm start` thing gets old. Let me know if you have any trouble with either, I'd love some feedback.

#linux #archlinux #patchbay #patchwork #git
